TopicTitle: School is out and the Summer of Kerbal begins!

Articles.Content: Woot, just entered the last of my grades and that's one more year done! Time for some serious Kerbaling!
Awesome! Im still dealing with exams. My space exploration program has come to a temporally halt
I haven't even left the atmosphere...

Haha LOL

Same with me. I just finished the IB MYP

Now it's time to go to space again Just launched the first module of my KSS yesterday. I'll share screenshots later when I'm on my computer (using iPad right now)...

Good Lock to all the summer Kerbonauts!!!

School just ended around a month ago for me

But, all schools are different...

That station looks great! Now, if I can figure out how to dock...
Exams for me (yaaaay) but we'll be free soon enough.

Now, if I can figure out how to dock...

It's tricky... I've had various amounts of success by flying straight at the station with at least 60 or 70 m/s of relative velocity... Swing the docking port at the last second for that 'spooky action at a distance' we love called docking!

JS

ps - Also, gratuitous amounts of MechJeb...
